overview:
Cyrille Geffray has been actively participating in the growth of Smart AdServer since February 2006. The first employee of Smart AdServer, he has successively held the posts of Business Development Manager then Managing Director as of September 2007.

Cyrille Geffray has 10 years of experience in the creation and development of companies in the field of new technologies and providing services to companies. Notably, Cyrille Geffray founded StepInfo, the most important independent company in France providing J2EE technology consultancy services, with over 100 employees.

Cyrille Geffray is a graduate of Grenoble Ã‰cole de Management and the ITESM.
